programInfo.title: The K-1000 Research Program
programInfo.description: The K-1000 Research Program is KIIT's flagship initiative to nurture the next generation of researchers and innovators. Our mission is to support 1000 exceptional students in pursuing cutting-edge research across various disciplines, fostering innovation and scientific excellence.

whyJoin.title: Research Excellence
whyJoin.description: Work on cutting-edge projects under the guidance of experienced faculty members and industry experts.

whyJoin.title: Global Exposure
whyJoin.description: Collaborate with international researchers and present your work at prestigious conferences worldwide.

whyJoin.title: Career Growth
whyJoin.description: Enhanced career prospects through research publications, patents, and industry connections.

benefits.title: Project Support
benefits.description: Access to state-of-the-art laboratories, research facilities, and funding opportunities to bring your innovative ideas to life.

benefits.title: Patent Guidance
benefits.description: Expert mentorship through the patent filing process, including IP rights protection and commercialization support.

benefits.title: Conference & Publication
benefits.description: Financial support for publishing in top-tier journals and presenting at international conferences.

benefits.title: Startup & Entrepreneurship
benefits.description: Access to KIIT's incubation center, mentorship programs, and networking opportunities with industry leaders.

benefits.title: Foreign MS/PhD Support
benefits.description: Guidance and recommendations for pursuing higher studies abroad, with access to KIIT's global academic network.

benefits.title: Community
benefits.description: Join a vibrant community where experts from diverse domains collaborate on groundbreaking projects.

socials.title: Follow on LinkedIn
socials.description: Stay updated with the latest news, events, and opportunities at K-1000 by following us on LinkedIn.

socials.title: Follow on Instagram
socials.description: Get a glimpse of our vibrant community, research activities, and success stories on Instagram.

socials.title: Join on Whatsapp
socials.description: Connect with fellow members, and peers in our dedicated WhatsApp community for real-time discussions and updates.

selectionSteps.title: Submit Application
selectionSteps.description: Fill out the detailed Google Form with your academic background, research experience, and aspirations.

selectionSteps.title: Assessment Test
selectionSteps.description: Take a comprehensive test evaluating your research aptitude, analytical skills, and domain knowledge.

selectionSteps.title: Final Selection
selectionSteps.description: Selected 1000 candidates will be added to the K-1000 research group and begin their research journey.
